item.title: 特朗普和欧洲在如何制裁俄罗斯时处于矛盾之处 - 《华尔街日报》

item.title: 纳瓦尼的寡妇说，新实验室证据证明他在监狱中被毒死 - 华盛顿邮报
item.description: Yulia Navalnaya说外国测试表明她的丈夫被中毒＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters

item.title: 特朗普返回联合国，因为加沙，乌克兰冲突愤怒 - 路透社

item.title: 随着以色列部队的前进，成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离了加沙市-BBC
item.description: 成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离加沙城，以色列军队前进＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 以色列磅加沙城，因为内部＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilgfbvv95cuxpu2raynixwnrrsgxxsujqunzumrvmgdkz1rrrogl2z1rrrogl2z1hnbtktavjjjjjjjjjjhovjhes0gtbebevax 0nyzff0sjdinueysxlsutr1tdfqetq3y1jcsunornnstdbsq0vmuum5agi0efj3mlvzavrc1jiogjiogj0ee1yc1yc1huzg1huzg1yc1ycwjamzlft2jamzlft224hycg9qu3q0c0ckvlq Qulse？ target =“ _ blank”>以色列坦克围绕着加沙城的地面入侵，因为欧盟在全球强烈抗议中提出的制裁＆nbsp; nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f” href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitAFBVV95cUxOSVlHSEFHT1BTSmZ6SmRteTc2QldKUUREXzQ3R2RuREM5SDM5TE42YmlsSThQNFZkUFFUOHBzdnN3WWlnY05ZSW1xZ udauwrzyxdraw9htmhku1k0odvzbkjztwfuutjut2pzcertrevucgt6dfu5suxndk1stzvoztj meExgcw1Jrwnzzgc5bv9faexzduptr1hjtlvoatvkzwc2m0f3algysnfjum1mvkggwaek？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>以色列开放了加沙城的新路线，死亡人数通过了65,000 ＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 成千上万的巴勒斯坦人逃离以色列炸弹，加沙市降雨＆nbsp; nbsp; <font color =“＃6f6f6f“

item.title: 当局说，法老的3,000年历史的金手镯从埃及博物馆消失了，哥伦比亚广播公司新闻
item.description: 法老的3000年历史的金手镯从埃及的博物馆消失了，当局说 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijafbvv95cuxovkfkf2uhrrserimuvzcew2a3fkbvq2wgzyewx2wgzyewx2owm3 Qnhnrgh6nhnrgh6dth2z2zyogjlre NZRM4YN3MXD1PYU2OZSVVLTKS2WFLXBFRKNWNWNATFLCDLOWBUVCLUUXAKFXVMLYYU9RC3VPAFBHMGX4SGEWA2RNBHDTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTNBHDTTNBHDTNBHDTNMTNMTNJMTNJMTNJM3JM3JAYCGN4BE1LNTJXXUG？ target =“ _ blank”>法老的无价手镯中缺少开罗博物馆＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn 搜索开罗博物馆缺少的古埃及金手链＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 法老的3,000年历史的金色手镯，埃及博物馆缺少＆nbsp; nbsp; nbc News <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxNaVhZdTFmRzVLNDRqckFMUWdUYTA1bFlPck1WT0E0S0Vua2FnaTZqSlIzc1VDZE9LUElfRWFmZWxpcHQ0R2x mzkrlrkrvsvp5zxljnm5ptnbqdvppbbbm0za1dqvu16wnlsrxf1tc1cy3v5q3m2svrmvr dftmfoslq2udrpwfh6vw9mrjlsbzdhvhbuv2tcrnczcdnqzl9uwllxssjzpsu9autjn？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>无价法老王的手镯‘从开罗博物馆偷了'

item.title: 英国法人移民是否返回交易？ -BBC
item.description: 英国移民返回交易可行吗？＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc shabana mahmood指责寻求庇护者提出'烦人，最后一刻的主张' href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxQQUxsUElRVjEwWkZvQWtZMmxvWUpwa1l0OFB5dzJUQnFYZ0NvQUZrcjhWbDd1VUQ4SVJKdUNaaU9XY 01fbGk4eGwxeFlHNW9jTUpLdEcyb0YtZFhSV25QNHFYLUtLV0hkVGZaSHFTektad0pmSXJKWDUwam1lNVdhbkZweksxenlIc01oYnJPbVhWb0dTRVBUTlpDVWUzUzJTRmNIdmlvR zNtZUhYdnJlWmwtY9IBuAFBVV95cUxOYUNlRWpsZTBTMUMtY0NlakJmUHdTd29aZGRBNlJGVUVfRWp4UGpRMTBhRVhFQlFUN1Z2dktyRGNRcmhpSDRoRW5kc2dRRFhRNE5XV3dyM XJOMlBEZGlIY0J0cTlrTnE1VFlsdXc4akw3Q1l1OHlpdjFqOGtvbGY0OWk3VldBaVpfal9SdV9vT295TUxsMXVTWWRjMy1PaEltamJqVTMyYjFkMmgyTEpmNkttZENHNjJq?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>英国法官暂时阻止政府计划将移民送回法国＆nbsp;＆nbsp; ABC News 寻求庇护者赢得竞标，以在英国法规条约下延迟驱逐出境＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMitgFBVV95cUxONEtyUGVMRzVxRGtRZk1uZzd4RnB6WjdsSlN5M1NDR1hrdkRQcmxSNWdZUlVmOEtLcWdNUGJWMFdZUnFrRmpsUVdlLU ljyujymkvjx0zfuznanxfpqzvnci1wm0znc2e0cdfdaxhlqwkzq1dfcvvoteixogzzrmrjevdtc jv3wwwzgyxliqku2a09pb0fznko3bgnxdkdkd6vnvjvzvzvzvzvonzjwnufoegvxbtjvtjvtjvt0rsbzjizw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>英国呼吁在法国移民下停止驱逐出境的努力＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.title: 在玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann
item.description: 涉嫌在玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）失踪中的德国男子从监狱释放＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte9bagppprtn6s3j0vffy1bnztuvf0ujbb RUZ0Y2NKEMPWCENJENBZVW5JVNRQNJJJJLX1VTEUZ3NANA25NA25NY1VWS2R5Q1RHM3RHM3RZYJBMZXDYMXNMDW？OC = 5英寸target =“ _ blank”>玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）可疑克里斯蒂安·布鲁克纳（ChristianBrückner href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmioafbvv95cuxotutgouywrhz3m2xsqu1hmhjplwrzz200awxmbwxmbwxvwxvwhhkkog1obnhkq2zvnkpjmudotototototwfnxvwffwffffz vwffffz vwaffz QZVVKSUZVdjF5Q1NRZVdVUWpyeEtQMmdtanJwNTlJNTloWDdoaVRkaUo0RkxFU1JJNGtURFhyVHZSdk9YM0oyZmZmczRSc3lWekVRcTRpSU0xQzNLYm1wNjlQejkwLXY3?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>玛德琳·麦肯（Madeleine McCann）嫌疑人从德国监狱释放出来 - 释放他的人说这不是故意的＆nbsp; nbsp; people.com <a a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiuAFBVV95cUxOX1dsb0hLRkZ3TlBsdHN4NFQxUGpWSEtua0t6dktOOERseFNEdnhSY2tqWFRxWlFaajFsMlZRelBvMjJjNU11Qm0zTW9 jvhdlumplwkfit1f5x1fitw1tawcyvmdyq2p0xzvptgjlefpwb2nmvg1mtfvrvrvrvrvrvzrutlhqquvyeh J5VHPZZKVIRMG2M1DQCKRNEVJ5ZW12LTKXTTJGCU5DAMLUVZFMDHJNZGR0VE45U3VPRDE4？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>英国探索引渡Madeleine McCann可疑ChristianBrückner＆nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 印度，欧盟接近自由贸易协议，在美国关税动荡 - DW
item.description: 印度，欧盟接近自由贸易交易，在美国关税动荡＆nbsp; nbsp; dw <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirwFBVV95cUxOQmx1UzRseUhsWkRBRkNHZVlFQ2VFRmVjYTRiRVhoV0ZjbTQtSmFyZm1WUnE2SFI2ZHAtdkE2R2ZsbFpJcjBxV mzguzjmd1jjjsgzrrlmtafjdd3dfc09xbtdluvdvsegtbvz3tgx3uujjrjrjztohdjuu9sywrtv lexsk9yqy00x3doejh4ejdwwwww02nwnheutxu2pqnxlnvtjxd2nkdedutfrwawzurgpn？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> EU眼睛更深的印度联盟，尽管担心莫斯科领带＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 军事业务如何成为欧盟印度自由贸易协议的游戏规则改变者＆nbsp; nbsp; euronews.com href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmifkfvx3lxte5jtfzibufvy3rjm2k1mehmcehetzewvtu5y2m3lurzdrurzdtdxuhz2sex1sex1ssex1 SksxoHv2WU01AJBPLWXVTZFVVVVVUVZNRM9IN2SXMY1LCU9XRK1NZWDCNKHDMGDMGDMGD1ATKYEGFUUNE5WU5WU5POUF0MMRRVT9CUTIMRVTF9CUTI2Y2Y2Y2Y3DDDDDDDCNVKCK1DW？ target =“ _ blank”> EU希望尽管俄罗斯链接 ＆nbsp; politico.eu 欧盟揭幕与印度交往，因为俄罗斯制裁套餐织机织机＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.title: 联合国调查委员会指责以色列在加沙的种族灭绝并敦促全球行动-PBS

item.title: 丹麦在与美国的紧张局势时在格陵兰领导练习。
item.description: 丹麦在与美国紧张时在格陵兰领导钻头＆nbsp; nbsp; euronews.com href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxozfj3nzrunvjbc3dpu0xfnejltltlnhtlnhtffmhfmughfmughfmughfmughrnajq4mzgzzgzz0r1semxtwdkwkwkrlu zBaN0tMZC1jNXp4TFVnSDNyVE9XQWwxVU1rYVVMbDRIaWlETE53cnRzMl9jejZuWUUtUlI1SDdZcEtwcjZpU0RNRVh6MUFoZE1tNHFEZ3NiMTB5RHlnRng?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>分析：格陵兰的防御措施是对俄罗斯和中国的支持，但特朗普可能是真正的目标＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> cnn 丹麦在没有我们的情况下在格陵兰进行大型军事演习，＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS 丹麦在格陵兰举行大规模的军事演习＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 时代杂志 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxQeXhfeE9ybDI3dGNmYVFEOTl6RU9hRncyVXFSTDB6akZrXzdfYTQxSk5QZ24wWXBxNkxQbzdkbEpqTk0xMU5MR hflmndsz1rsuzhsughlc2lma1fnctzmyvjiahdosjfnzwvfrwi3zlfys1dyadjymkvvskhhhd zrfos1za3jjd1zzefrxwkw5tlfibe1pofpqs3dregtsqudqtxzhwldpvmndc0nfeve？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>丹麦将2.5亿美元用于格陵兰的基础设施＆nbsp; nbsp; bloomberg.com

item.title: 研究说，俄罗斯在210个地点灌输了乌克兰的儿童 - 《纽约时报》
item.description: 俄罗斯在210个地点灌输了来自乌克兰的儿童，研究说＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqwFBVV95cUxNdzJ4TUZhTzdINFFHQnc3T3BZQXB4S09kU01ZOFh3RHpValBRMDRseFhBSEN5cTQwQW5CWWl0elotSWwwT08 yb0v4xzfnykr6szazmgxkcdzrn01xcg03bfzcyy1lqwm2ytfieg1wtgvvvt3puvme3vtnjet dmuwxsajfjbzz4tfq0tnjhbgjxoc1ylxhqcejhbwf6bgt1y3fhugtvukdxmeltmxm？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯对乌克兰儿童进行军事训练和教育，耶鲁大学的研究人员发现＆nbsp; npr 俄罗斯在210个设施中绑架了被绑架的乌克兰儿童“强迫军事化”，研究发现＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmizgfbvv95cuxorhlqmmf3qulsb1lqbuiyyywd 4CGK1BGZFSDFUSMVZS3N4RKP5QVZWNJZJQZHBU0FZU1FKSGFKFJAI1KMVUWQMVUWQMZUVMR4UC1LA3BYRHI4VZHWRV nmrvgydwtlwmqxdhz5sw40dwpnzldxderirkjrnnhprxfpx2jhefizrzdtutrid1ruewqwv3hise9znxfou xrfyjjpb0tnelhovg1kn2pns09pzxlqyzd4eeljq1bsanbkbbeprdljauejtzmjmjmjmjmjmjmjmjm5a0nrcupuuq？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯拥有200个营地网络，用于'洗脑'乌克兰儿童 - 报告＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbminafbvv95cuxnsmraoundqv9tbthxsjjqendmb09fsg9udevpalo2cdbtmm5ozvbmmmzjem2dfu2lclvlvlvlvlvlxlxlxy3c 0pBTHUyUWU1QUZic2dnVjdCR2pmU0pPNGlsYVdXS182eWZMQmJIX0NSQjFYbEo5ZlJ3QXZBUzFseGNydFk4VThBZWluRV96U1lteVpGV003eGVZOC15eURhaVRWUFQ?oc=5" Target =“ _ Blank”>俄罗斯对乌克兰的帝国侵略达到了一个可怕的水平＆nbsp; nbsp; 电报

item.title: 以色列的卡塔尔袭击是一个昂贵的失败-Axios
item.description: 以色列的卡塔尔攻击是昂贵的失败＆nbsp;＆nbsp; axios <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxNcTF0SjFXUGVPM013dzZuMTFvVkhxZHJjaTJncWR2UnZBeXBPYncyZnAxZUdyUVhPVmZBdjhWdVJjci1Be nc3z1b3rnluakvuyjdtyi1px25rcxneehp2r2r2r2r21qltj6rxvcenvbzuo5cznfrlvyqw81ttl aakdad1lld1v6cnrkohfjlvr2blzeczjirvvjm3fyr3l5unviru16sdrzv3hywks？oc = 5“ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列战斗机在卡塔尔罢工中从红海发射了弹道导弹，官员说 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiugfbvv95cuxpnue4bwdmb0gweelfy 1LJY2WYUW9LBEFOYNRQTHZICHRHNWOWCE45VLR2Y1BENHDHMXDPX1ZZD2PSMHNRX1I3MGS1RGS1RG51N et1y21bngxyq3yty3dgnkszuexmdklhthfwb2hqqqwx3nvbqccjfryunkcu5ktc1pdxl3yurpwuvyw NU5YZR0AZVWST2FMVUPIN2TLELZLNHFDMVPHPHULY5Q0RCC3BKUG5RCC3BKUG5REW0WA0WA0UTMK5GCWC？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>海湾国家希望唐纳德·特朗普（Donald Trump href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixefvx3lxte5gt1k2wk1ozgjhv2hkekx66efhpvuuyq 29NWGRSBVNIOEF4U1VLUVDMDLFSALZFOFBYCKVJYTNMNDN0VNRYAUT0TU9PAL9PAL9PAL9UVU5VTMW1D2XUSUL6TMXA？ target =“ _ blank”>哈马斯官员自多哈罢工以来首次亮相href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwwfbvvv95cuxoauvdtkhirke2cw41bu4t sxhxtmmynjlldnbwukndwxf4ctj2dfh0a3uwnklirhzhqmtzqi1iyknvz0m0m0r1o1nkzvemtslujqdttz OR0FNSGHQVM1XYZZ3WULKZ3ZOWKWXEENQMVJQQQQWVSVSVSVSVSVRNM1IEFBRCKP0SU8YWXNARM02A19RQ0LLD0 O2NULRCFHJBM5MN29OETJ4DWYZNKDUEUDGX0E5RUTFM2XSCSCVDBANK3YVUZVHLFNLFNLJGWTFYQU0？ target =“ _ blank”>特朗普说，在以色列在卡塔尔罢工之前，内塔尼亚胡没有告知他＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 尼泊尔，孟加拉国，斯里兰卡：Z世代革命的南亚是否肥沃？ - 半岛电视台
item.description: 尼泊尔，孟加拉国，斯里兰卡：南亚Z革命的肥沃？ href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiwkfvx3lxte5nb1fxwndvr2zbbgjhu2g0q01wrlpj rjhpwtzduxozcnjkwue5swjwu0v5mk5twmzfsvfanwlxsknrnggzyktoagjymwzhdndnd4d2yyx0ndyndpzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>我们遭受痛苦时政客们会变得富有 - 因此，我在48小时内帮助我们的政府＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 尼泊尔政府如何在烟雾中涌入＆nbsp; 纽约时报 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMisgFBVV95cUxOR1FaTGU4U1JKTUltdm96dUVJYXR6ejM1Q0pUaGl0SkhDd096NWNkTU9tTmQ0LVBkNnlUNTV3Smk2cTNQTkV4OER kalb5vhhvnufcuxbvwna3smxptujkqvcvczwgd1dethyxlxauotslpsrpsr0tjofl1zuv0tfvsogtn NLBSSNPFZ0FIWVM3MGU4AI00TNHJVKVILUDNQWSYULL3ZI1VQWU5LTH6CTY1UE1WDJBR？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>从科伦坡到加德满都，愤怒的青年运动推翻了根深蒂固的精英＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmilgfbvv95cuxqohvsm1nvahn5tld0be5dyllpngxtnxdebnu5x05x05fs3ruvldwow52z2tpcv C5ZFQYNEZRZWMYYXDYLTFXRWJIYTA2Q0S5A1ROMGXOZTRKN2XWBWBWTXUW9KYKL2AHK4CMS5WDNIVDNIVEDHMKZDTB1WELKZDTBUZS0TCXRHUJHHNEZGUNFEUNF3UC0 1Unh0bnRJU2NibWfSAZsBQVVfeXFMUFU5SVZweVh5S0JlRVc1WGFqV2dTR1JjUU9fUFJwMW5xT2N5bk9ZZndMdWV4Tl9IX29aeDFUTExkLXFYWWdkSGpl A3FTVWTDD3FQNLVBTEHQVGI3CJL2BM9JM1VSQLVMMMLDNE56B0Z2TLZYVFLLDFN6X1NID2X1ZMN6VNHRJIDNHRRJIDNYNYNY4CMPQZVZVZZRLBBONKHKHKBBGXNBGS？ target =“ _ blank”>普京应该看尼泊尔，害怕＆nbsp;＆nbsp; hill
